description: {"blocks":[{"key":"c9tmj","text":"This protocol describes a method for the isolation of pan-lymphocytes and pan-myeloid cells from human whole blood. By providing defined media formulations, volumes at each step, and a defined dilution factor for density centrifugation, it yields consistent single-cell suspensions across samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ji3f","text":"Create the following IMDM-FBS-PSQ Media in a 500mL bottle of IMDM by using the table below: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35rlg","text":"      Component  Volume (mL)  Starting Conc.   Final Conc.*    IMDM  500  -  -    Penicillin-Streptomycin-Glutamine  5  100X  1X    FBS  50  100%  10%  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":152}],"data":{}},{"key":"f1icp","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","3_3":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"D_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":["216","107","123","117"],"data":[["Component","Volume (mL)","Starting Conc.\u0026nbsp;","Final Conc.*"],["IMDM","500","-","-"],["Penicillin-Streptomycin-Glutamine","5","100X","1X"],["FBS","50","100%","10%"]],"guid":"49569BF0E9E911EBB73D0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"34mhh","text":"Table 1.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"79jhc","text":"*Final Concentration is approximate.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Volume (mL)","Starting Conc.\u0026nbsp;","Final Conc.*"],["IMDM","500","-","-"],["Penicillin-Streptomycin-Glutamine","5","100X","1X"],["FBS","50","100%","10%"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bp92","text":"Remove the mononuclear cell layer from each tube with a transfer pipet to   tubes - mononuclear layers may be combined at this step to reduce the number of tubes to spin. Add cold DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution to a final volume of   and centrifuge the cell suspensions for   at  ,  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":224,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":266,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":271,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":274,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3uib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"A645BF60E9EA11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"AAE0CB50E9EA11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"AEE2CB90E9EA11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"400","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B1DFB7E0E9EA11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B4090080E9EA11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7vf9","text":"Remove the supernatant and re-suspend the cell pellet in   cold DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution and centrifuge the cell suspension for   at  ,  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":126,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":131,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":134,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97q7f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"BB378890E9EA11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"BE2580C0E9EA11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"120","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C0D07C80E9EA11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C321E690E9EA11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"46f50","text":"Remove the supernatant and re-suspend the cell pellet in cold   IMDM-FBS-PSQ Media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"agvkt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"CB167DC0E9EA11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"573eu","text":"Count cells, and viability by using the NC-3000 cell counter. Calculate total viable cells and record below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4t62u","text":"cell number: __________cells/mL, __________% viable","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4e8cr","text":"final volume: __________mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejb55","text":"𝑐𝑒𝑙𝑙 𝑛𝑢𝑚𝑏𝑒𝑟 (𝑐𝑒𝑙𝑙𝑠/𝑚𝐿) ∗ 𝑣𝑖𝑎𝑏𝑖𝑙𝑖𝑡𝑦(%) ∗ 𝑓𝑖𝑛𝑎𝑙 𝑣𝑜𝑙𝑢𝑚𝑒(𝑚𝐿) = 𝑡𝑜𝑡𝑎𝑙 𝑣𝑖𝑎𝑏𝑙𝑒 𝑐𝑒𝑙𝑙𝑠","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbkbq","text":"Total Viable Cells: __________","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hg6f","text":"(Optional QC) Aliquot 2 x 106 cells to a   Falcon tube and place on ice for subsequent flow cytometric analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":28,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ei13p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"1C5C75E0E9EB11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5smf5","text":"Aliquot cells for analysis or experimentation, and then freeze down remaining cells in up to 2 x 107 aliquots using Cryostor CS10 Medium, a Mr. Frosty, and a   freezer ( -  aliquots, round down to the nearest 20 million cells and discard/freeze/use any left over cells). Record the number of vials frozen: __________.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":99,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":158,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":169,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":171,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ajkf2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"239F7050E9EB11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"28ACC610E9EB11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"2E2030A0E9EB11EB8B26AFD1EB795A34","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
